original_text: Their graves are in the deepest parts of the deep hole of death. Soldiers who fought with them lie all around. They were very cruel to people when they were alive. But they died in battle and now they lie in their graves. Their graves are in the deepest parts of the deep hole of death. Soldiers who fought with them lie all around. They were very cruel to people when they were alive. But they died in battle and now they lie in their graves. Their graves are in the deepest parts of the deep hole of death. Soldiers who fought with them lie all around. They were very cruel to people when they were alive. But they died in battle and now they lie in their graves.
korean_text: 그 무덤이 구덩이 깊은 곳에 만들어졌고 그 무리가 그 무덤 사방에 있음이여 그들은 다 죽임을 당하여 칼에 엎드러진 자 곧 생존하는 사람들의 세상에서 사람을 두렵게 하던 자로다

sentences.original_text: Their graves are in the deepest parts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 무덤은 가장 깊은 곳에 있고

sentences.original_text: of the deep hole of death
Soldiers who fought with them lie all around
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 싸웠던 군인들이 사방에 누워 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They were very cruel to people
when they were alive
But they died in battle
and now they lie in their graves
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들은 자신들의 무덤에 누워 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Their graves are in the deepest parts
